name: Pong for Vic20 - By Mario Morra
name_original: Pong for Vic20 - By Mario Morra
description:
Pong clone for 50th anniversary of Atari Pong

Emulator: Vice (VIC20)

How To Play:

Press Space: Launch the ball (for all players or CPU)

Press F1: Switch 1 or 2 players

Q-A : Up-Down Player one

O-L : Up-Down Player two
